1.0.1.name: wordpress/lazy-seo
1.0.1.description:
This plugin will automatically create exact match keyword/location combo title tags and meta descriptions that randomly rotate with each refresh. In addition, if you check the box to replace h1's, it will add an exact match h1 to the content, or replace the first one if it exists, with the same keyword/location combo.

How to use:

1) Select whether you want to use the replace h1 feature - as mentioned above, this will replace the first h1 tag within the content of your page/post with the selected priority keyword/location combo for that post. If there is no keyword priority, it will select a random keyword from your keyword list in the settings. Locations will only be used if selected as priority. If there is not an h1 tag to replace, a new one will be added at the top of the content.

2) Enter an integer for the number keywords you want to use for the site. These keywords will be used throughout the entire site to generate title tags, meta descriptions, and
